sentence: You can constantly hear people talking in the halls walking by and doors opening and slamming shut
I will say they may want to get the elevator serviced
Second the elevator ran very very slow and seemed to struggle to pull us up to the 4th floor
There is a Fridays right in the complex and we ate there although seeing a uniformed guard at the entrance to the bar did worry me a bit
Lights at entrance way out
Marijuana smell overtaking the rooms and hallways
The elevator that I took to my room had no heat and was always freezing
The equipment needs maintaining
Not many amenities but I guess you get what you pay for
the noise next door and hallway was loud too
Facilities manager was responsive to our requests for meeting rooms
The lobby was nice and clean
At the front desk Cheryl made sure we were aware of the key amenities and services
It is the staff especially general manager Ryan Caldwell and the clean comfortable spacious rooms plus great gym and pool that make this Courtyard Mariot stand out
The facilities are very nice in the style of the new Courtyard properties

The Mariot Courtyard in Greenbelt Maryland offers a convenient location easily accessible from the DC Beltway and a most accommodating and friendly staff to assist in making meeting plans from meeting rooms with any amenity needed to a wonderful menu selection for including a convenient meal while using the facility as well as overnight accommodations should that be needed

The lobby restaurant area had plenty of space different types of seating with electrical outlets USB charging stations in almost every piece of furniture at least that I saw but it is so wide open that you kinda feel like everyone can hear your business
and they have all sorts of amazing accommodations
She made accommodations for them so easily and with a smile on her face
The hotel had plenty of amenities pool gym PC kiosk with a printer and a bistro cafe that serves breakfast lunch and dinner as well alcoholic beverages
